description:
Who should take this course?

This course is for those that want to create their own website in a specific subject or topic that they are passionate about. Otherwise known as an "Authority Website", this course is a great option for beginners because authority websites have a low startup cost and if done correctly, can continually generate income on a monthly basis.

This is a mini course which covers the absolute basics.

This course covers:

  • What an authority website is
  • Common website misconceptions
  • Choosing a authority website topic
  • Making money with your website
  • Why most people do keyword research incorrectly

What went into producing this course?

In total, this course is about 1 hour of total content. This mini course was relatively simple to create because it is a fraction of my much larger course The larger course took a tremendous amount of work and has a very high production value. There was a team of five people who worked a total of 130+ hours on the course.

What is this course about?

Many people have tried to create authority websites before and failed. This course aims to change that. This mini course will allow you to build a foundation for creating your own authority website.

What kind of materials are included in this course?

This course has two different types of videos in the lectures.

The first type of videos explain general concepts and uses animations and call-outs to illustrate key concepts.

The second type of videos are screen recordings with call-outs that show you exactly what you need to know to use Google Analytics with your course.

Why take this course?

If you finally want a successful website that continually generates income on a monthly basis and have grown tired of listening to other people who have never actually created their own successful authority website, then this course is for you. Here you will understand the foundation to creating your own Authority Website.
title: Building a Niche Website For Beginners
